title: 19773- Software Engineer NEW!

This individual must be proficient with Linux, C/C++, Qt, OpenCV, OpenGL, and have experience performing unit and system level integration and testing and writing software documentation.This position is in a fast paced and dynamic environment requiring tasking flexibility to meet ever changing customer objectives. It will require the ability to work within a team structure as well as work independently with minimal supervision.
